channel.title: Wondering?auth system
channel.description:
ok i made a auth system based of my friends script but he uses a online website to recieve the information like the ip and etc. he says PHP
and i was wondering if it can work if i make a .txt file on my computers desktop so that i can do this instead of doing this
[code]URL url = new URL((new StringBuilder()).append("http://www.alexspage.co.uk/login/auth.php?u=").append(s1).append("&p=").append(s2).toString());[/code]
thats his thing that sned the infor to him but can i do this
[code]URL url = new URL((new StringBuilder()).append("http:myip\C:\Users\devil\Desktop\information.txt").append(s1).append("&p=").append(s2).toString());[/code] if not can someone set up a site for me that allows this connection?

[quote=“miyu miyu5, post:10, topic:267188”][quote author=io9 link=topic=352748.msg2705759#msg2705759 date=1236976295]

URL url = new URL((new StringBuilder()).append(“http:myip\file:\C:\Users\devil\Desktop\information.txt”).append(s1).append("&p=").append(s2).toString());

i lol’d
[/quote]w/e im just trying to get some help u started like a dumbass at first so plz dont tell me shit kk and thanks for all ur motivational help :)[/quote]just because you are retarded do not assume that everyone once was
